column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom mma yɛmfa ahyɛse nkyerɛkyerɛ a ɔfa Kraest ho no nto nkyɛn na yɛnhom do nkɔ emudzi mu: na mma yɛmmfa ndwuma a nkwa nnyi mu ho nnuho
column6: nye nsa a wɔdze gu obi do
column8: nye onnyiewiei atsɛmbu nnto hɛn fapem bio."

column2: "Na iyi sɛ Nyankopɔn ma kwan a

column3: na wɔasɔ ɔsor akyɛdze no ahwɛ
column4: na woenya Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no bi
column6: "na wɔasɔ Nyankopɔn asɛm mbrɛ ɔyɛ papa nye wiadze a ɔreba no mu tum ndwuma horow ahwɛ
column9: onnhia dɛ wɔbɛdan hɔn bio akɔ nnuho mu; osiandɛ wɔbɔ Nyankopɔn Ba no mbeamudua mu bio ma hɔnho
column10: na wɔhyɛ no bagua mu fɛr."

column2: "Na asaase a ɔnom nsu a ɔtɔ gu do
column3: na ofir edziban a ɔsɛ hɔn a hɔn ntsi so na wɔdɔwee no

column2: "Na sɛ ofifir nsoɛ nye nhwirom a

column5: naaso hɛn enyi da ndzɛmba a oye kyɛn kwan wɔ hom ho
column6: nye ndzɛmba a ɔnye nkwagye nam:"

column2: "na Nyankopɔn nnyɛ nyia ɔnntsen na no werɛ efir hom ndwuma nye ɔdɔ no a hom kyerɛe wɔ ne dzin ho
column3: dɛ hom soom ahotseweefo no na hom da ho som."

column2: "Na yɛpɛ dɛ hom nyina kyerɛ mbɔdzembɔ yi nkorkor ara ama hom enyidado aahyɛ ma dze ekodu ewiei:"

column3: na mbom hom aayɛ hɔn a wɔnam gyedzi nye abotar do nya anohoba no hɔn esuafo."
nna onnyi obi a ɔso sen no a ɔbɛka ne ntam ntsi ɔkaa nankasa no ho ntam"

column2: "Na ɔtɔɔ no bo ase tweɔɔn dɛm no
"Na adasa ka nyia ɔso sen hɔn ntam; na ekyingyebra nyina ewiei nye ntam a wɔdze si do."
"Ntsi na Nyankopɔn pɛɛ dɛ oyi sakyer a ne tsirmsɛm nnsakyer kyerɛ anohoba no adzedzifo no pefee a

column3: ɔnam ndzɛmba ebien a ɔnnsakyer a ɔda no edzi dɛ Nyankopɔn nndzi ator wɔ biribiara mu no do
column4: yeeguan abɔdɔ dɛ yerubosuo enyidado a wɔdze esi hɛn enyim no mu dze eenya awerɛkyekyer a osi pi."

column2: "Enyidado a yɛwɔ no dɛ ɔkra ne sekyɛ a ɔnntsɛw na otsim na ɔhɛn mu kodu dza ɔwɔ ntwamutam mu no mu:"
"hɔ na Jesus hɛɛn hɔ maa hɛn dɛ ɔkandzifo a wɔayɛ no daa sɔfopanyin wɔ Melkizedek ne nhyehyɛɛ do."
